# os-family

Guess what? It gives you OS family. Whoa!

```js
var osFamily = require('os-family');

var isWindows = osFamily.win;
var isLinux = osFamily.linux;
var isMacOS = osFamily.mac;
```

## Install
```
npm install os-family
```
